articles.title: Live: US deploys B-52 bombers to Middle-East in warning to Iran - FRANCE 24 English
articles.description: American B-52 bombers arrived in the Middle East on Saturday after Washington announced their deployment as a warning to Iran. Meanwhile, Israeli forces on Sunday intensified air and ground offensives in northern Gaza, killing at least 23 people. Follow our l…
